Author: swordlady00
Text: Thank you so much. I've calmed down a little and I'm kinda scared at what this ED has made me into. Panic attacks over 0.6 lbs... what the hell... sorry for freaking out.

Author: LowCalPal
Text: It's just water.  Your body is beholden to the laws of physics and can't create mass from nowhere.  You are still burning calories more than you're taking in, so any upward change in weight is an artifact of fluid balance.  Make sure you are getting sufficient salt and electrolytes: electrolyte imbalance can make you retain fluid as well.
